pages.text: Some rites speak of a demon known as Leonard, and many names he goes by, such as The Black Goat of the Woods, Azazel, and The False King of the Templars. However, many of these are contradictory, and he seems to be a demon that resides over witches, often marking his initiates with his horns.

pages.name: Leonard
pages.text: One of the more powerful demons of hell.
